.. _atlantis.wxgui:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
:obj:`atlantis.wxgui`
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

:ref:`atlantis.wxgui` subpackage contains some modules implementing
:ref:`pyAH <pyAH-project>` graphic user interface using
`wxPython <http://www.wxpython.org>`_ library.

Each gui element in :ref:`atlantis.wxgui` package is designed as
generic components that can be used in further projects with no or
little modifications.

Modules in :ref:`atlantis.wxgui` package:

.. autosummary::
   atlantis.wxgui.hexmap
 
Contents of :ref:`atlantis.wxgui` package:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   hexmap
